song.title: Uniongoze, Yehova
song.englishTitle: Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah

verses.verse: Na kisima cha uzima, maji ya utabibu, Fungua kwa moyo wangu, ninywe na kuponyeka! Uninyweshe, unilishe, hata nimetosheka.
Wakati wa kuuvuka, ule mto Yordani, Hofu yangu ufariji, ‘Nione uso wako. Nyimbo shangwe, nyimbo shangwe, Nitaimba daima.
